/*****************************************MCU HW-SW MAP*****************************************/

[!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuDeInitApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuPerformResetApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "McuSafety/McuInitCheckApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "McuSafety/McuGetModeApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuStandbyCtrlApiEnable = num:i(1)"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuStandbyRampApiEnable = num:i(1)"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuGtmUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuDeInitApi = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuDeInitApi = 'true'"!] [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuGtmUsed = 'STD_ON'"!]
Table 1: MCU SFR Usage per API
API Name SFRs Used Remarks
Mcu_Init SCU_RSTSTAT, SCU_RSTCON, SCU_RSTCON2, SCU_PMSWCR1, SCU_ARSTDIS [!IF "$McuGtmUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , GTM SFRs done by Gtm_Init() [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$CrcHardwareModeUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , FCE0_CLC[!IF "$Crc32HardwareModeUsed = 'STD_ON'"!], FCE0_IN0_CFG[!ENDIF!][!IF "$Crc16HardwareModeUsed = 'STD_ON'"!], FCE0_IN2_CFG[!ENDIF!][!IF "$Crc8HardwareModeUsed = 'STD_ON'"!], FCE0_IN3_CFG[!ENDIF!] [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$DmaHardwareUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , DMA_CLC, DMA_ERRINTR [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuStandbyModeEnable = num:i(1)"!][!// , SCU_PMSWCR0 [!ENDIF!][!// -
Mcu_DeInit SCU_PMSWCR1, SCU_RSTCON, SCU_ARSTDIS, PMSWCR0, Gtm SFR deinit is done by Gtm_DeInit, FCE_KRST0, FCE_KRST1, FCE_KRSTCLR,MODULE_FCE0,MODULE_DMA
Mcu_InitRamSection - No SFRs used
Mcu_InitClock SMU_KEYS, SMU_CMD, SMU_AG3, SMU_AGCF3_0, SMU_AGCF3_1, SMU_AGCF3_2, SCU_TRAPCLR, SCU_CCUCON0, SCU_CCUCON1, SCU_OSCCON, SCU_PLLSTAT, SCU_PLLCON0, SCU_PLLCON1, SCU_PLLERAYCON0, SCU_CCUCON2, SCU_CCUCON5, SCU_CCUCON6, SCU_CCUCON7 [!IF "ecu:get('Mcu.fCPU2Exists') = 'true'"!], SCU_CCUCON8[!ENDIF!] [!IF "$McuClockMonitorEnable = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , SCU_CCUCON3, SCU_CCUCON4 [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuFmPllEnabled = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , SCU_PLLCON2 [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuMainOscillatorFrequency >= num:i(16)"!][!// , SCU_PLLERAYCON1, SCU_PLLERAYSTAT [!ENDIF!][!// -
Mcu_DistributePllClock SMU_KEYS, SMU_CMD, SMU_AG3, SMU_AGCF3_0, SMU_AGCF3_1, SMU_AGCF3_2, SCU_PLLCON0, SCU_PLLCON1 [!IF "$McuClockMonitorEnable = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , SCU_CCUCON3, SCU_CCUCON4 [!ENDIF!][!// -
Mcu_GetPllStatus SCU_PLLSTAT -
Mcu_GetResetReason - No SFRs used
Mcu_GetResetRawValue - No SFRs used
Mcu_SetMode SCU_PMSWCR1, SCU_PMCSR0, SCU_PMCSR1[!IF "ecu:get('Mcu.fCPU2Exists') = 'true'"!], SCU_PMCSR2[!ENDIF!] [!IF "$McuClockMonitorEnable = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , SCU_CCUCON3, SCU_CCUCON4 [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuStandbyModeEnable = num:i(1)"!][!// , SCU_PMSWCR0, SCU_CCUCON0, SCU_CCUCON1, SCU_OSCCON, SCU_PLLCON0, SCU_PLLERAYCON0 [!ENDIF!][!// -
Mcu_PerformReset SCU_SWRSTCON -
Mcu_InitCheck Refer SFRs used by Mcu_Init(), Mcu_InitClock(), Mcu_GetPllStatus() and Mcu_DistributePllClock() -
Mcu_GetMode SCU_PMCSR0, SCU_PMCSR1[!IF "ecu:get('Mcu.fCPU2Exists') = 'true'"!], SCU_PMCSR2[!ENDIF!] -
Mcu_SetStandbyCtrlReg SCU_PMSWCR0 -
Mcu_RampToBackUpClockFreq SCU_PLLCON1, SCU_PLLCON0 [!IF "$McuClockMonitorEnable = 'STD_ON'"!][!// , SCU_CCUCON3, SCU_CCUCON4 [!ENDIF!][!// -
Mcu_ChkWkpStdby SCU_PMSWSTAT -
Mcu_ClrWkpStdby SCU_PMSWSTATCLR -
Gtm_Init GTM_CLC, GTM_CMU_GCLK_NUM, GTM_CMU_GCLK_DEN, GTM_CMU_CLK_EN, GTM_CMU_CLK0_0_CTRL, GTM_CMU_CLK0_1_CTRL, GTM_CMU_CLK0_2_CTRL, GTM_CMU_CLK0_3_CTRL, GTM_CMU_CLK0_4_CTRL, GTM_CMU_CLK0_5_CTRL, GTM_CMU_CLK0_6_CTRL, GTM_CMU_CLK0_7_CTRL, GTM_CMU_ECLK0_NUM, GTM_CMU_ECLK1_NUM, GTM_CMU_ECLK2_NUM, GTM_CMU_ECLK0_DEN, GTM_CMU_ECLK1_DEN, GTM_CMU_ECLK2_DEN, GTM_CMU_FXCLK_CTRL, GTM_CTRL,GTM_IRQ_EN, GTM_IRQ_MODE, GTM_EIRQ_EN, SRC_GTMAEIIRQ -
Gtm_DeInit SRC_GTMAEIIRQ, SRC_GTM_GTM0_TIMi_j (i = Number of TIM modules, j = 8 (Number of TIM channels)) SRC_GTM_GTM0_TOMi_j (i = Number of TOM modules, j = 16 (Number of TOM channels)) SRC_GTM_GTM0_ATOMi_j (i = Number of ATOM modules, j = 8 (Number of ATOM channels)) -

 

/******************************************MCU MPU Settings******************************************/

[!IF "$DmaHardwareUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$CrcHardwareModeUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuGtmUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuPBFixedAddress = 'true'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!// [!IF "$McuSafetyUsed = 'STD_ON'"!][!// [!ENDIF!][!//
Table 2: MCU SFR and Memory Range
Start Address End Address Remarks
DMA_CLC DMA_PRR0 DMA Initialization done during MCU Initialization only
FCE0_CLC FCE0_IN3_LENGTH CRC Initialization done during MCU Initialization only
GTM_REV GTM_MSCIN1_INLCON GTM Initialization done during MCU Initialization only
SMU_CMD SMU_AG4

SMU alarm flags to be disabled during MCU clock initialization only
SCU_ID SCU_TRAPDIS SCU SFR usage by MCU driver
MCU_START_SEC_CONST_32BIT MCU_STOP_SEC_CONST_32BIT Mcu_kConfigPtr - 32 bit constant used by MCU
MCU_START_SEC_VAR_32BIT MCU_STOP_SEC_VAR_32BIT

[!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuPBFixedAddress = 'false'"!][!// Mcu_kConfigPtr, [!ENDIF!]Mcu_ResetStatusVal - 32 bit variable[!IF "McuGeneralConfiguration/McuPBFixedAddress = 'false'"!]s[!ENDIF!] used by MCU
MCU_START_SEC_VAR_8BIT MCU_STOP_SEC_VAR_8BIT Mcu_ClockSetting- 8 bit variable used by MCU
MCU_START_SEC_CODE MCU_STOP_SEC_CODE

MCU driver - Basic AUTOSAR functionality
MCU_START_SEC_SAFETY_CODE MCU_STOP_SEC_SAFETY_CODE Mcu_InitCheck and Mcu_GetMode safety APIs fall under this section
